attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The standards of personal behaviour in the Government is neither an example to the population, nor would it be permissable in private or public employment.

The Prime Minister is the final sanction on this behavior and yet he appears to skirt the edges of permittable behavior.

If the Prime Minister is not policing sleaze, then who is?

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
